wikipedia_page.main: Rory David Morrison (5 August 1964 – 11 June 2013) was a newsreader and continuity announcer for BBC Radio 4.

response: On 28 June 2013, the News Quiz paid tribute to Radio 4 announcer Rory Morrison, who used to read the news cuttings on the programme.
* Rory Morrison (Castle) - BBC Radio 4 newsreader and continuity announcer
*5 August – Rory Morrison, radio newsreader and continuity announcer (died 2013)
*11 June – Rory Morrison, 48, newsreader and continuity announcer on BBC Radio 4
**Rory Morrison, 48, radio announcer and newsreader (BBC Radio 4).
*Rory Morrison, 48, British radio announcer and newsreader (BBC Radio 4), lymphoma.BBC Radio 4 newsreader Rory Morrison dies
